articles.title: Palestinian American student shot in Vermont paralyzed from the chest down - NBC News
articles.description: Hisham Awartani, one of the three Palestinian students who were shot in Burlington, Vermont, last weekend is paralyzed from the chest down.
articles.content:
Hisham Awartani, one of the three Palestinian students who were shot in Burlington, Vermont, last weekend is paralyzed from the chest down.
